correct_answer: Cooking is a complex chemical reaction.

description: Temperature control is a crucial aspect of cooking that affects the rate and type of chemical reactions taking place. name: Acids

description: Acids are chemical compounds that can donate protons or hydrogen ions (H+) in a solution. They play a crucial role in various culinary and biological processes. name: Cooking

type: Scientific Discipline
description: The chemistry of cooking plays a crucial role in determining the taste, texture, and nutritional value of the food we eat. name: Cooking Process

description: Cooking is the process of preparing food by applying heat. It involves various techniques and methods to achieve desired results. name: Chemical Reactions
type: Process
description: Chemical reactions are processes that lead to the transformation of one set of chemical substances into another. In cooking, these reactions can change the texture, color, and flavor of food. name: Maillard Reaction
type: Chemical Process
description: The Maillard reaction is a chemical reaction between amino acids and reducing sugars that occurs when food is cooked, leading to the formation of new compounds responsible for rich flavors and aromas.

correct_answer: Fermentation is a food preservation technique involving microorganisms.
